title: MRP fixed for White/ Red Raw Rice at Rs. 210/- per kg
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s Consumer Affairs Authority had declared that the Maximum Retail Price of a kilogram of White or Red Raw Rice will be Rs 210/-, with effect from Friday (10).
